entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as a person who screamed, and Harry is looking for her. She is described as the one who might be in trouble.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, and he is running away from the golden mist. He is looking for Fleur and thinking about winning the Triwizard Cup.

entities.name: triwizard cup
entities.description: The Triwizard Cup is mentioned as a prize that Harry wants to win, and he sees an image of himself raising it in front of the school.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Fleur's safety and is looking for her. He wants to know if she is all right.
Harry has a goal of winning the Triwizard Cup, and he sees an image of himself raising it in front of the school.
